code: import GetLocation from"./getLocation";import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import cn from'classnames';import{useMediaQuery}from"react-responsive";import{searchData}from"../api/fetchData";import{isScrollable}from"../utils/common";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function InsuRequest(){const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[parkingName,setParkinName]=useState('');const isPc=useMediaQuery({query:"(min-width: 990px)"});const[scrolled,setScrolled]=useState(false);const handleKeyDown=e=>{if(e.key==='Enter'){onClickSearch();}};const onClickSearch=async()=>{const trimmedValue=parkingName.trim();if(trimmedValue){await searchData(trimmedValue).then(result=>setData(result));}};useEffect(()=>{setScrolled(isScrollable);},[data]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:cn('w-full pt-[120px]',{'h-[400px]':!scrolled,'pb-[140px]':scrolled}),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"div_wrap flex_center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"my-8 w-full flex_center flex-col",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:cn('flex items-center  border h-[50px]',{'w-[450px] text-[16px]':isPc,'w-[300px] text-[9px]':!isPc}),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:" text-black font-[500] h-full flex_center border-r basis-1/3",children:"\uC8FC\uCC28\uC7A5\uBA85"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"search_input",onChange:e=>setParkinName(e.currentTarget.value),onKeyDown:handleKeyDown}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:" text-black  font-[500] h-full flex_center border-r basis-1/3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"w-full h-full text-white bg_base hover:text-[#FFD840]",onClick:onClickSearch,children:"SEARCH"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GetLocation,{data:data})]})})});}
